bug.author: bradyoo
bug.summary: Creating a CompositeConfig with empty list of jobs crashes
bug.description: Alluxio Version: What version of Alluxio are you using? 2.3.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. Attempting to run new CompositeConfig(Lists.newArrayList(), true) crashes when you attempt to get the status of this job.
